# AURA Core — Data Pack

This folder contains knowledge assets for **AURA** (Agentic Unified Reinforcement for Academics).
These files are referenced by agents across planning, design, execution, and QA of learning experiences.

## Files
- `aura-kb.md` — High-level AURA knowledge base
- `elicitation-methods.md` — Education-focused elicitation patterns
- `brainstorming-techniques.md` — Creative/structured ideation tactics
- `pedagogical-preferences.md` — House style & teaching preferences (fill in)
- `assessment-levels-framework.md` — Which level of assessment to use when
- `assessment-priorities-matrix.md` — Priority rules for assessment coverage
- `bloom-taxonomy.md` — Levels with measurable verbs and assessment fits
- `instructional-patterns.md` — Proven teaching patterns & when to use them
- `accessibility-standards.md` — Accessibility guidance for learning artifacts
- `rubric-templates.md` — Analytic rubric patterns & scoring tables
- `course-types.md` — Standard course types and structural guidance
- `learning-metrics.md` — Metrics & analytic definitions for learning impact
